\fancyheadoffset[LO]{33mm}
\fancyheadoffset[R]{32mm}
%\fancyhead[LE]{\rightmark}
%\fancyhead[RO]{\leftmark}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}

\fancyhead[L]
{
	\ifthenelse{\isodd{\thepage}}{}{%
		\rotatebox{-90}{%
			\hbox to 0pt{%
				\Huge\fontfamily{ugq}\selectfont\rotatebox{180}{\fboxsep=10pt\colorbox{gray}{\color{white}\thepage}}\hbox to 0.3cm{}%
			}%
		}%
		\vspace*{-100mm}
	}%
}

\fancyhead[R]
{
	\ifthenelse{\isodd{\thepage}}{%
		\raisebox{0pt}[0pt][0pt]{
		\raisebox{-16.6cm}{%
			\rotatebox{90}{%
				\hbox to 0pt{%
					\Huge\fontfamily{ugq}\selectfont\rotatebox{180}{\fboxsep=10pt\colorbox{gray}{\color{white}\thepage}}\hbox to 0.3cm{}%
				}%
			}%
		}%
		}%
	}{}%
}
